Wore as bridesmaid’s dress for my friends’ outdoor wedding in autumn. Nice fit and color. Sized to match.
Great color fabric weight nice was comfortable not see through and the cut was nice and clean
True to size and well made. Perfect for parties and weddings.

Very attractive style. Four stars for fit, beautiful color, and overall fashion statement. Minus one star as the material wrinkles very quickly and requires a lot of ironing post laundry. Also, the sash is little odd as it can be worn in front or in back and thus doesn't lie perfectly in either position.

This dress is the softest , most comfortable dress I have ever worn. For someone who is plus size such as myself, I didn't feel fat. I actually felt very pretty and got a lot (and I mean a lot) of compliments on how this dress looked on me. I ended up ordering another dress in a different color just to have variety because I loved how this dress looked and felt so much.

I loved the feel and look of this dress. I wore it to my daughters wedding. It can be difficult shopping for clothes online but the size guide was perfect and it fit as expected. I love that it comes in multiple colors.
It fit very well but you will need to wear a slip under it or all black garments because it was a little see through. I ordered it in the color whit and will order again!
Those is one of my favorite dresses now! It's absolutely beautiful. The color the material the way it lays nicely!! Very pleased with this purchase! It's exactly how it's pictured.
I really like this dress with pockets unfortunately it didn’t fit me when I tried in on the zipper was a little struggle but the fabric was comfortable
I like the fact that the back is a bit longer than the front. Very nice--fabric feels fine. Didn't actually wear it for the event I got it for, but I'm sure I'll wear it in the future.
I loved the fit, style and design so much, I bought 3 different colors. This is perfect for the office, wedding or upscale party. This is probably my favorite dress. The best part, it has POCKETS!!

I have always been hesitant on buying a dress online with my size. I am 5'5" and 200 pounds. My measurements are 43, 38, 45. I ordered the size 16 based off of these measurements and it fits absolutely perfectly. The material is so soft and not overly heavy, and not at all thin. I purchased the Navy colored one and it's a beautiful true navy, not like a royal blur. It has stretch in the material and hugs exactly where it is supposed to without showing any of the mommy pouch that I have. The length is a beautiful tea length and the neckline is so formal and beautiful. Another added feature I enjoy is the underarm area. The dress comes up to actually cover the skin where normally it would be left open with the flowy sleeves. I am very happy the dress and it exceeded expectations. To the point that I actually wanted to share a review! I
I love the dress! It fits true to size the material is thick and I love it
Write this dress for my goddaughter’s wedding. The fabric was comfortable, so beautiful and the best part….pockets!  Would definitely recommend.
The top of this dress was way too small.
Bought for a graduation, and have worn several times since. Great fit, flattering shape, very comfortable, flowy, good quality material. Would buy again.
I rarely have success when I order things through amazon being a plus size gal. This is the first dress that has been flattering and has fit well and was a good quality.

评论概述: The size runs a little small
评论详情: I ordered this dress for a wedding reception and it fit small.  I used the sizing on the page, and it was tight when I put it on.  I returned the dress.

评论概述: Needed quick dress for a funeral.
评论详情: When the dress came it immediately felt like good material, it was heavy but it was of quality. The minute I tried it on it fit like it was a designer dress, I'm 5'7 280 with a very sharp hourglass figure this dress fit me perfectly. My out-of-town funeral was hard enough to deal with outside trying to find clothes that looked appropriate. This dress was a knockout! I hope to purchase from this person/creator again I only hope that future purchases are of the same quality and make.
It was very dirty as if someone had already worn it. It smells very bad and it is stained.

The dress is very pretty the material was heavier than expected. It was true to size but hid my curves so I looked a bit boxy. It arrived fast, it wasn't wrinkled, appears to be good quality, and most important its plus size friendly!

评论概述: not the exact color I got it/
评论详情: I don't like the color.  still I did not get the refund . please review it.

The style of the dress is nice and I’m not going to lie, I’m bigger than the model in the picture.  Bought this for an awards gala and the length was perfect and it didn’t have that “bridesmaid” feel as other dresses I tried on amazon.  NOW the cons…the dress is MUCH lower cut in the v-neck than shown and I ended up sewing a modesty panel into it to “cover”.  The biggest disappointment was the fact that it comes wrinkled. You can enjoy wearing it wrinkled and don’t even attempt to remove those wrinkles because you can’t and trying to do so only makes it worse!!!  So I wore a really nice dress that looked like I slept in it to the gala because I waited to long to try and “iron”/steam/wash them out.  And now it’s too late to return it.  So my loss is thrift stores gain.  A one time wear regrettably.
Wish I took a picture I totally spaced it but it fit so nice.  I'm tall 5'10ish 265 flares out just below the bust covers large belly. My hubby didn't like the sleeves I did.
This dress was worth the purchase! Not see through, and fit as expected based on measurements. Very comfortable and flattering.

This dress impressed me right out of the bag, thick material, lined, flattering cut hides my mama belly, and the best part is the under arms have a modesty panel so your bra doesn’t show.  The color is stunning as well, this one is a home run for me.

I am only 5'4" tall and short waisted. The sash is at my waist. I ordered one size up since I wanted to make sure it would be loose around my waist & hips. I love the angled hem.  This dress could be casual and dresses up with jewelry.  The material is good quality.
I love this dress. It is flattering and the material is nice. It isn’t see through so no slip needed. Awesome quality.
This dress fit just as I hoped. It was longer than anticipated. At 5’3” the back nearly reaches the floor. I was glad for the slip being included.
I loved everything about this dress and it has pockets. It fit really well and everyone loved it. I  will order so more colors.
This dress was very comfortable to wear and looks great on whether you’re tall or short. It doesn’t wrinkle easily which is another plus. I would highly recommend it!

LOVED the cut and flow of the dress. It did fit smaller than sized, but has some stretch to it...unfortunately as I was getting out of the back of an Escalade the zipper split - it wasn't tight, but the dress just opened up on me.
The fit is great. It looks good and is flowy. Good for summer and a good length for taller people.

评论概述: Finally a plus size dress that does not emphasize the belly
评论详情: This dress is classy and the material is heavy (which I like compared to the thin materials on other dresses). Dress fit my body type. Recommended if you carry more weight in your stomach area. Looks so much better than those empire waist dresses that are popular right now.

I love the dress but hate the wrinkles. It came in this small package. I have tried everything to get the wrinkles out. I've soaked it in water and hung it to drip dry and low and behold the wrinkles are still there. I bought this dress to wear to my daughter's wedding. I hate the thought of ironing it for fear it will scorch.  I'm stuck with this beautiful dress that is full of wrinkles..........

I absolutely love this dress! It fit like a glove and made me feel so pretty & feminine. I got so many compliments!! I originally ordered red but I’m now ordering it in another color because it was just so perfect for me!
It fit well but was not a dressy as I would like for an upcoming wedding.

评论概述: Sturdy material! Like buying from a department store
评论详情: The fabric is virtually wrinkle-resistant. Sure, it arrived in the "bag" package and had a few faint creases, but after popping it on a hanger in the bathroom (and promptly taking a hot shower to create steam), I left her in there overnight and the wrinkles were gone. There was also a nice weight to the fabric that makes it feel like it'll last a long time. Unlike most other stores on Amazon, this one actually sold what it advertised. Neckline is "just" right, but I'm sure cleavage will be more noticeable if you wear a push-up bra (when does that NOT happen, though?). If you told me you had bought it at Belk or JCPenney, I would believe you. Definitely worth the price. 10/10 would buy again. I hope the other dresses from Pinup Fashion are made like this one.

I wore this for my Jack & Jill party and I got so many compliments. I am 5'3", 215 and I ordered the size 16. It was comfortable, the included slip was really nice, and I felt very pretty in the dress. My only issue is because of my height the back was a little long, it did it the ground just a bit. Also, it has pockets! Overall would definitely recommend.

评论概述: Very nice heavy-duty material that wears well.
评论详情: I wore this dress to a wedding and it is very well made, not cheap material. Loved the pockets in it!
Beautiful color and well made.

Dress exceeded my expectations, fit was perfect, length was perfect & material was great!. I purchased the dress for a funeral on a whim and it worked out great. Give yourself time to steam the wrinkles out from the way it’s packaged. But otherwise glad I took the chance . I’m not a dress person but would order this one in another color.
Much thicker and nicer than I expected.

I like this product! I got it in red. Great value for the money. It fit to size, the fabric was long, but light and flowy in the summer night heat, and was stylish! I am 5’1” and the dress came down to the tops of my feet. I wore it with sparkly sandals to attend a wedding anniversary event. I did have to gather the skirt going down stairs in Washington DC, but it gave me that glam Bridgerton feel in doing so, lol!  The fabric was also very durable and structured yet a little stretchy and flattered my figure well. I received several compliments from friends, family, and strangers all during the two times I have worn it so far since my purchase.
Great fit, fits comfortably.
Love love this dress  I wore this dress to a funeral The dress fit like a glove  the selves  are my favorite so beautiful how they have ruffles  on them and fit omg  love it .
Nice dress. Hot fabric, though, for (unfortunately) a very hot day.

I was very pleased. Bought for a wedding. I am 5’5 and it was slightly longer than I expected (I wanted just below the knees. It was more shin length), but still a great purchase. Wearing to my nieces wedding as a guest. Fit was as described.
I wore this dress for my nieces sweet sixteen. It's a perfect. No complaints.

This simple dress was great for a funeral. However, it reminded me of the dress I wore when I was in a band concert in high school 😂 It has a flattering shape, but it’s so simple that I wouldn’t wear it to any other events. Comfortable, flowy, and versatile color. Fits loosely in my opinion.
Got for my mom who is a large plus size woman & she looked beautiful! The fit was perfect for her body shape.

评论概述: Good dress, Pockets! Checks most of the boxes
评论详情: I was looking for a dress to wear to my daughters wedding. She requested that I wear pink. The dress fit, the material is good, you do have to iron it. The pockets were EXCELLENT. I have to carry a small medical device, so pockets are a must for me. The color was more dusty pink than pictured on-line. I did feel it was a little plain, and the style was not me. It was comfortable, but it wasnt the look I wanted. I did return it. I thought it was a very well made dress. It was even lined! If it had just a little more oomph, I might have worn it. Otherwise it ticked all the boxes.

I like the cut of the dress but I can easily see my legs through the skirt, even in the soft lighting in my bedroom. I tried adding dark leggings/hose but it didn’t help the issue.  That makes it unusable for me. It’s too hot were I live to add an extra layer with a slip so I will be returning it.
The dress fit exactly as expected and I used the size guide. It was comfortable and modest.
Fits like it was made for me!
Perfect fit!

This dress material was heavier than I expected so I was worried when I opened it. But it was amazing.  I have some back fat by my bra and this dress makes my back look soooo nice and smooth.  The front is also very nice and flowy.  It's High low which I also was worried about but love.  Adds just enough elegance.
Beautiful shade of pink and the fit is as expected. Great value, comfortable with pockets.

The (Navy) dress I picked was perfect. Sized up due to bust and it was perfection, pockets are deep and hidden even with a phone. Beautiful as bridesmaid dress or night on the town, work or church. Casually elegant, beautiful lines, flutter sleeves and hi low drape that hit knees just right. It's light blended material but not see through. Super.comfy to be in all day even on a 82 degree outdoor wedding. HAND WASH ONLY.

I should have ordered up a size it was a bit snugg around the girles but other than that it was perfect.

I bought this for my daughter, size 20.  It was quite flattering.  Seemed a little simple, but at the same time I think it could be dressed up.  She liked the longer length and it covered some of those parts your trying to hide.

I was hesitant at first because I'm in Hawaii and I didn't think I would get my order the day it would be delivered. It is comfortable, beautiful, and exactly how it was advertised!!! I love this dress and can't wait to use it :)

I dressed this up with a silver glitter tie on belt and it was perfect for a cocktail party event. Definitely needs a slip underneath as the crepe material is a bit thin but it flows so nicely. I’m excited to wear this again for Derby or Oaks 🐎  I would recommend sizing one up as it was a bit snug in the bust for me at my normal size.

I was completely conflicted on the dress after reading all of the reviews but took a chance on it anyway. I typically wear 16/18W (2X) bottoms and 18/20 (1X) tops. I ordered the 20 plus because reviews stated that the dress had no "give" and it is perfect. I probably could've sized down but because of the bow, it works out wonderfully. Length is perfect. Definitely something that I'll be comfortable wearing considering dresses aren't really my thing. Definitely considering ordering the emerald green color as well.
I am very much against white for my wedding but this was the most comfortable dress ever. It was exactly what was advertised

It was a perfect fit. I was well pleased.
De excelente calidad y queda muy bien

FINALLY! A perfect dress for all occasions for true plus size. I am a true 22 size, however I sized up bc I needed a dress in a pinch for a funeral. The 26 is perfect, slightly big but not drowning. This looks great for a funeral bc it is coverage but not frumpy. I am going to order in additional colors for other occasions to have. As a plus size woman it is hard to find classic stylish pieces that don’t look matronly or frumpy. A true gem of a dress.
Although the dress is beautiful, the cut is nice and different so awesome to have pockets. It is so heavy would not recommend to any of my friends to purchase.

Material feels so nice I wore for my maternity pictures and it looked amazing and was nice and cool

The fabric is a heavyweight polyester kind of fabric with a zipper back. There is a tie for the waist. Very flattering. Hides the tummy. Very pretty and very comfortable. I ordered up a size and it is a roomier fit but it fits well and is comfortable.

Bought this for a wedding and I loved the dress. Got many compliments on it.
